descriptionHtml:
Revealing Female Fur Armor!

There\'s also a bare-shoulders version: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2513

Updated to version 2.1: Version 2 needed a slight fix.

Updated to version 2: No longer conflicts with other fur armor variants, so they will no longer have big invisible sections.

This mod includes the meshes and texture for the armor only.  The character\'s skin texture should go to whatever you have set up.  If you don\'t have anything set up for that, I\'d recommend the thong from getcapes\' Snow Leopard Forsworn: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1867

As the description of that mod says, the parts to install for the thong are:

- Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets
- Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female
author: Clarian
